channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [MSHADE-59] XmlAppendingTransformer fails when running behind a firewall
item.project: Maven Shade Plugin (Moved to GitHub Issues)
item.description:

item.summary: XmlAppendingTransformer fails when running behind a firewall

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
BTW the workaround we are using, is just to specify the proxy

-Dhttp.proxyHost=myl33tproxy -Dhttp.proxyPort=8080
This project has moved from Jira to GitHub Issues. This issue was migrated to apache/maven-shade-plugin#414.
